mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_info(user_email, user_pass, user_name, gender, user_birth, user_tel, user_regdate) VALUES (#{user_email}, #{user_pass}, #{user_name} , #{gender}, #{user_birth}, #{user_tel}, sysdate)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM customer_info WHERE user_email = #{user_email} and user_pass = #{user_pass}
